name: FaciPay
summary: Accept payments in Angola using FaciPay - Multicaixa Express, References, and more.
description:
FaciPay iOS SDK provides a simple, secure way to accept payments in your iOS app.

Supported payment methods:
- Multicaixa Express (instant mobile payment)
- EMIS Reference (payment reference code)
- FaciPay Payment Request

Features:
- SwiftUI and UIKit support
- Async/await API
- Pre-built UI components
- Rive animations
- Sentry crash reporting
